jobs.title: Senior Software Developer
jobs.description: We're looking for an experienced Senior Software Developer to join our engineering team. The ideal candidate will have strong expertise in backend development, database design, and cloud infrastructure.
requirements: 5+ years of experience in software development
Strong proficiency in Node.js, Python, or Java
Experience with cloud platforms (AWS, GCP, or Azure)
Understanding of microservices architecture
Experience with CI/CD pipelines
Strong problem-solving and debugging skills

jobs.title: Marketing Specialist
jobs.description: We are seeking a Marketing Specialist to support our marketing campaigns across digital channels. This role will focus on content creation, campaign execution, and performance analysis.
requirements: 2+ years of experience in digital marketing
Proficiency in content creation and social media management
Experience with marketing analytics tools
Strong written and verbal communication skills
Bachelor's degree in Marketing, Communications, or related field

jobs.title: Sales Representative
jobs.description: We are looking for an energetic Sales Representative to join our growing sales team. The successful candidate will be responsible for expanding our customer base and meeting sales targets.
requirements: 3+ years of B2B sales experience
Strong negotiation and closing skills
Experience with CRM software
Excellent communication and presentation abilities
Track record of meeting or exceeding sales targets

jobs.title: HR Assistant
jobs.description: We are seeking an HR Assistant to provide administrative support to our HR department. This role will assist with recruitment, onboarding, employee records, and general HR operations.
requirements: 1+ years of experience in HR or administrative role
Knowledge of HR processes and best practices
Excellent organization and attention to detail
Strong communication and interpersonal skills
Proficiency in Microsoft Office and HRIS systems

jobs.title: Junior Software Developer
jobs.description: We're looking for a talented Junior Software Developer to join our engineering team. This role will focus on frontend development and user interface improvements.
requirements: 1-2 years of experience in software development
Proficiency in JavaScript, HTML, and CSS
Familiarity with React or similar frontend frameworks
Strong problem-solving skills
Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or related field

jobs.title: Support Team Lead
jobs.description: We are looking for a Support Team Lead to manage our customer support team. The ideal candidate will have experience in customer service leadership and a passion for customer satisfaction.
requirements: 3+ years of experience in customer support
1+ years of team leadership experience
Strong problem-solving and conflict resolution skills
Excellent communication and interpersonal abilities
Experience with support ticketing systems

jobs.title: Product Manager
jobs.description: We are seeking an experienced Product Manager to lead our product development initiatives. This role will be responsible for defining product strategy, roadmap, and features.
requirements: 5+ years of experience in product management
Track record of successful product launches
Strong analytical and project management skills
Excellent communication and leadership abilities
Technical background preferred

jobs.title: QA Engineer
jobs.description: We are looking for a QA Engineer to ensure the quality of our software products. This role will be responsible for test planning, execution, and automation.
requirements: 3+ years of experience in software testing
Experience with test automation frameworks
Knowledge of Agile development methodologies
Strong analytical and problem-solving skills
Attention to detail and quality focus

jobs.title: Financial Analyst
jobs.description: We are seeking a Financial Analyst to support our finance team with budgeting, forecasting, and financial reporting. This role will work closely with department leaders on financial planning.
requirements: 3+ years of experience in financial analysis
Strong proficiency in Excel and financial modeling
Experience with financial reporting and forecasting
Bachelor's degree in Finance, Accounting, or related field
CPA or CFA preferred

jobs.title: Benefits Specialist
jobs.description: We are looking for a Benefits Specialist to manage our employee benefits programs. This role will be responsible for benefits administration, employee inquiries, and vendor management.
requirements: 3+ years of experience in benefits administration
Knowledge of health insurance, retirement plans, and other benefits
Experience with HRIS and benefits administration systems
Strong communication and customer service skills
PHR or SHRM certification preferred
